alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 8:57AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Fergus County below 4500ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap
